title: Submitting to my Boss
description: Lily is a shy new graduate at a company run by Jack Beaumont. He is rich, powerful and has a confidence which is hard to resist. However, he also has kinky sexual tastes and has set his sights on corrupting Lily. Quickly she finds herself drawn into a new world of bondage and submission and surprises herself by starting to like it. How far will she be willing to go in order to get the man she wants?
author: Cheri Grade
